title: European Premiere: Lovelife – Nova
content:
Fresh from a run of US shows with Ellie Goulding, LA-via-London quartet Lovelife return right in time for the stereotypically short-lived British summer.

Bolder and more adventurous then ever before, Nova is undoubtedly one of this years most anthemic tracks, ready made for party playlists. Equal parts elegant and ferocious; showcasing the pinnacle of their songwriting thus far, it’s easy to see why they’re winning over fans in colossal numbers on both sides of the Atlantic. With official remixes for Gaga and Imagine Dragons under their belts, alongside a mightily impressive live show, Lovelife look set to grab hold of 2014 in a way that few bands have done thus far. Check out Nova below, and grab a download immediately from iTunes, as well as a free download of previous single, Angel.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
